title: Popeye
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Robert Evans and Robert Altman
brief_description: The comic strip and animated sailor hero with a thing for spinach comes to life in this meticulous live action kids film. Director Robert Altman traces the origins of Popeye, his battle against arch-rival Bluto and his budding romance with Olive Oyl. Cast includes Robin Williams, Shelley Duvall, Ray Walston, Paul L. Smith, Paul Dooley.
